item.description:
Jenney won a VIP party for 50 at the Pour House. She has graciously invited our meetup members.

The VIP party coincides with their All-American Summer promotion--Baseball, Hot Dogs, Nachos & Apple Pie. Nothing screams summer like baseball and hot dogs!

They are transforming the downstairs bar area into a Red Sox lounge every Tuesday night starting at 6pm for VIPs only. (open to guests 21+only) The Sox will be on all our large flat screen Hi-Def. There will be free Hot Dogs buffet with all the fixins', nacho bar and homemade apple crisp from 6-8 pm, complimentary peanuts in the shell(yes, just toss the shells on the floor!) and chances to win Pour House Giftcards! There will be a Reserved area for our group,

Access to the food buffet from 6-8 pm, Welcome gifts upon arrival, and chances to win  giftcards.

Of course, you have to buy your own drinks since we live in puritanland, or you can just enjoy free hot dogs!

Please RSVP by 8/20 - they are requesting our RSVP list that day.

*As always update you RSVP if your plans change. Don't flake out.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: After work - VIP party
